title: Abbotsford Chiropractic Centre - Chiropractor in Abbotsford, BC Canada :: Acupuncture
description: Abbotsford Chiropractic Centre - Providing Chiropractic Care, Registered Massage Therapy and Acupuncture in Abbotsford, BC
cleaned_text: Jing Wang, a qualified TCM doctor, graduated from Beijing University of Traditional Chinese Medicine as an M.D. in 1987 and has been licensed by the Province of BC to practice Acupuncture since 2003. She has practiced acupuncture and traditional Chinese therapy for over 25 years and has extensive clinical experience. Jing Wang has been practicing at the Abbotsford Chiropractic Centre for over 10 years and has helped more than a thousand patients. Jing Wang offers many types of bodywork treatments including Acupuncture, Acupressure, Cupping Therapy and Ear therapy. What Can Acupuncture Treat? Acupuncture has been proven effective in the treatment of many disorders. The following is a list of conditions effectively treated: NEUROLOGICAL: Headaches, Migraines, Dizziness, Tunnel Syndrome, Neurogenic Bladder Dysfunction MUSCULO-SKELETAL: Arthritis, Neck and Back Pain, Tendinitis, Frozen Shoulder, Tennis Elbow, Chronic Lumbar Muscle Strain, Joint Pain (knee, ankle, shoulder, elbow, wrist, finger), Muscle Cramping, Muscle Weakness DIGESTIVE: Abdominal Pain, Constipation, Diarrhea, Indigestion EMOTIONAL: Depression, Insomnia, Nervousness, Neurosis GYNECOLOGICAL: Premenstrual Syndrome, Dysmenorrhea, Amenorrhea, Menopausal Symptoms, Infertility RESPIRATORY: Asthma, Acute and Chronic Bronchitis, Common Cold, Sinusitis, Smoking Cessation SKIN DISORDERS: Shingles, Eczema, Acne Vulgaris, Urticaria, Hair Loss, Neurodermatitis EYE-EAR-NOSE-THROAT: Acute and Sinusitis, Shortsighted (under 20 years old), Tinnitus, Tonsillitis MISCELLANEOUS: Stress Reduction, Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS), Blood Pressure Regulation, Immune System Toning, Addiction Control, Weight Control
